name: Deep Pipes
description:
Deep Pipes is a single player adventure puzzle game in which you have to find the right way out by passing through the correct pipes.

The 1st level is very simple, but starting from the 2nd you will have to puzzle over the solution.

Explore all 16 interesting levels!

1. Use the WASD or Arrow Keys to move around and get inside pipes.

2. Pres "R" to restart.
